perturbation.original_text:
1.  DEFINITIONS
     1.1. AFFILIATE shall mean, when used with reference to a party, any
individual or entity directly or indirectly controlling, controlled by or under
common control with such party. For purposes of this definition, "control" means
the direct or indirect ownership of at least 50% of the outstanding voting
securities of a party, or the right to control the policy decisions of such
party.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.  DEFINITIONS
     1.1. ASSOCIATE shall mean, when used with reference to a party, any
individual or entity directly or indirectly influencing, influenced by or under
common ownership with such party. For purposes of this definition, "control" means
the direct ownership of at least 25% of the outstanding voting
securities of a party, or the ability to suggest policy decisions of such
party.
perturbation.explanation: The definition of 'AFFILIATE' is changed to 'ASSOCIATE', and the definition of 'control' is modified to be less restrictive. 'influencing' is not synonymous with 'controlling'. Reduces ownership percentage to 25%. This creates uncertainty about which entities are bound by the affiliate clauses in the agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
1.22. USER shall mean a single person who accesses and views a Site whether
directly from a web browser or through a Link.
     1.23. USER DATA shall mean all data generated by an Internet server that
relates to file requests, user identification, transaction logs, session times
and other information regarding the Users generated or collected by or through a
Co-Branded Site, but excluding any information that relates or refers to a
particular project of such User.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.22. VISITOR shall mean a single person who accesses and views a Site whether
directly from a web browser or through a Link.
     1.23. VISITOR INFORMATION shall mean all data generated by an Internet server that
relates to file requests, client identification, browsing habits, visit duration
and other information regarding the clients generated or collected by or through a
Co-Branded Site, but including any information that relates or refers to a
particular project of such Visitor.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'USER' has been replaced by 'VISITOR,' and 'USER DATA' has been renamed to 'VISITOR INFORMATION.' Additionally, 'transaction logs, session times' is replaced with 'browsing habits, visit duration'. More importantly, 'excluding' is changed to 'including' any project related info. It's unclear if these terms are meant to be equivalent, creating ambiguity about the scope of data covered.

perturbation.original_text:
3.1. Impresse shall use commercially reasonable efforts to respond to all
support requests by VerticalNet relating to the Co-Branded Site within one
Business Day (as defined below) of Impresse's receipt of such notification.
Impresse shall use reasonable efforts to cure the reported problem as soon as
reasonably possible. VerticalNet shall provide Impresse with all information
reasonably requested by Impresse in connection with a reported problem for which
VerticalNet is requesting support under this Section 3.1  [ONGOING SUPPORT]. VerticalNet shall use
commercially reasonable efforts to respond to all support requests by Impresse
relating to the Co-Branded Site within one Business Day (as defined below) of
VerticalNet's receipt of such notification. VerticalNet shall use reasonable
efforts to cure the reported problem as soon as reasonably possible. Impresse
shall provide VerticalNet with all information reasonably requested by
VerticalNet in connection with a reported problem for which Impresse is
requesting support under this Section 3.1  [ONGOING SUPPORT].
perturbation.changed_text:
3.1. Impresse will endeavor to respond to all
support requests by VerticalNet relating to the Co-Branded Site within one
Business Day (as defined below) of Impresse's receipt of such notification.
Impresse shall use its best efforts to cure the reported problem as soon as
reasonably possible. VerticalNet shall provide Impresse with all information
requested by Impresse in connection with a reported problem for which
VerticalNet is requesting support under this Section 3.1  [ONGOING SUPPORT]. VerticalNet is required to
respond to all support requests by Impresse relating to the Co-Branded Site within three Business Days (as defined below) of
VerticalNet's receipt of such notification. VerticalNet will attempt to cure the reported problem. Impresse
shall offer VerticalNet with the required data by
VerticalNet in connection with a reported problem for which Impresse is
requesting support under this Section 3.1  [ONGOING SUPPORT].
perturbation.explanation: Changes have been made to the wording in Section 3.1 to weaken the standard of effort required. 'Commercially reasonable efforts' is swapped to 'endeavor to'. Also, 'best efforts' replaces 'reasonable efforts'. As well as, VerticalNet must now respond with 3 'Business Days' (opposed to 1). The changes in terminology and duty create uncertainty in the standard of support required from each party and the timeframe each must adhere to.
